title: Jerami Grant and Chris Webber
description:
Zach talks to Detroit's Jerami Grant about his breakout season in Detroit, and Chris Webber discusses what a Pistons revival would mean -- plus Bad Boys memories, reflections on the Kings-Lakers rivalry of the early 2000s, and more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
